fields.headline: The activity holiday
fields.bodyText: The mountain bike course in the Trois Vallees resort of Meribel is the largest in the world, and on 7-8 July amateur riders can compete in the Trois Vallees Mountain Bike Challenge alongside world-class professionals, in a series of events of varying difficulty. These include a 70km tour of all three valleys, and a timed descent of the 7,000ft drop from the top of the Saulire to Brides-les-Bains. Contact the Meribel Tourist Office (00 33 479 005 000; meribel.net) for details.
